column2: "<%me>, hello there. Seems like I managed to run into you again."
"I've been hearing about a lot of your activities lately."
"Skill and the ability to act are everything in this world. You're becoming known as someone with both."
"Gaining a reputation is something that's often seen as a blessing, but it comes with adverse side effects as well."
"You should be careful as \"the nail that sticks up gets hammered down\"."
"While some might praise your actions, others might look down on them in contempt."
"To contrast, while I may have received a special promotion, this position comes with it's own burdens."
"Sorry, I've giving you advice in retrospect of what I've experienced. I'm looking forward to seeing more from you."
